description:
This course is intended for Bernina Software 7 owners who want to learn all the ins and outs of Bernina Software 7.

This course is 60 min of Bernina Software 7, and the seventh course of twenty courses where we will explain the workings of Bernina Software 7.

Explore Step Fill types, settings and stitchangels, as well as what Pull compensation, underlay and stitch density is, and how to manage.

  • Fill types Summary on where to use
  • Lace fill use as is and then edit some
  • Cross stitch fill and pattern fill I show how
  • Manage Pattern Fills and enjoy the selection
  • More about fill stitches and how to manage.
  • The importance of stitch sizes and the outcome
  • Meandering offers 3 choices, your choice
  • More about the meandering
  • Stitch lengths, single run or more use it, it is fun.
  • More about stitch settings
  • Create a beautiful quilt block.

We have broken Bernina Software 7 down into 20 courses of not more than 60 min each for your convenience. In each course we will cover a section of the software
title: #08: Bernina Software 7 The Fundamentals of Fill Stitch 3
